MAX_RESULTS.label: Stories per page
MAX_RESULTS.description: Maximum number of news stories to show per page

BASE_URL.label: URL
BASE_URL.description: The url for the feed or web service

CACHE_LIFETIME.label: Cache lifetime
CACHE_LIFETIME.description: The length of time to cache the feed from the server

ITEM_CLASS.label: Item Class
ITEM_CLASS.description: The class used to parse RSS items. Rarely needs to be changed

ENCLOSURE_CLASS.label: Enclosure Class
ENCLOSURE_CLASS.description: The class used to parse RSS enclosures. Rarely needs to be changed
